title: Honor Badges
body:
I think it would be pretty neat to add the honor badges to players profile, so that that player, and other players when looking at the profile can see the badges. I know that I personally would like to know what other badges I have other then seeing only 1 in the loading screen. It would be a nice way of filling in a big of the blank space on the profile background as well.

Kinda like this V (excuse this crappy edit job) but have the badges vertical, like they are hanging from the top.
